name: Hentai Queens
description:
Hentai Queens tries to transport the player to the corridors of the royal palace of wishdot and a real romance with his queen.
Gameplay is a Match 3 classic.

FEATURES
-Different Fantasy Girls to Undress
-Fantasy Theme
-Can Undress


Relax and Enjoy.
Try to get high Scores and be happy!


All characters are over the age of 18.
